description:
Use your phone as a camera directly in OBS Studio.


This release adds support for OBS Studio version 32.
Home page: droidcam.app/obs
Tip: click [Watch] on this GitHub repository to get notified about new releases.
DroidCamOBS.Setup.2.4.1.exe (Windows 10/11 (x64, arm64), OBS v32+)
DroidCamOBS_2.4.1_macos.pkg (macOS 10.13+ (x64, arm64), OBS v32+)
droidcam_obs_2.4.1_linux_x86_64.zip (Linux systems with FFmpeg7/libavcodec61 (x64))
